column1: or expenses, at the relevant time, rather than years before the marking of such
a deposition as evidence in the Court.
At  this  juncture,  this  Court  would  like  to  express  our  appreciation  to  the
learned  ASG  for  his  submissions  on  the  concept  of  a  fair  trial,  which  a  trial
Court should always adhere to, during a trial.
